FuncDef: This command, limits debugging only to the specified messages in the discovery phase.
CLIs: discovery [ padi ] [ pado ] [ padr ] [ pads ] [ padt ]

ParaDef.Info: Limits debugging only to padi messages.
Limits debugging only to pado messages.
Limits debugging only to padr messages.
Limits debugging only to pads messages.
Limits debugging only to padt messages.
